question: A person performed FARD salaah 4 many years & was unaware at that time of this mistake-surahs were read in 3rd & 4th rakaats of the fard salaah.Does the salaah have 2 be performed again??
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
If a person unknowingly recited Surahs in the third and fourth rakats of
Salaah, the Salaah will be valid, the person does not have to repeat the
Salaah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
